alumni.name: Robert Zhang
alumni.bio: Former President who now works on systematic trading strategies at BlackRock's Systematic Active Equity team.

alumni.name: Maria Garcia
alumni.bio: Specialized in derivatives risk management and now leads a team of risk analysts at JPMorgan.

alumni.bio: Pioneered our algorithmic trading strategies and now manages a quantitative hedge fund portfolio.

alumni.name: Lisa Park
alumni.bio: Expert in machine learning for financial markets, now developing next-generation trading algorithms.

alumni.name: Thomas Brown
alumni.bio: Built our first paper trading platform and now leads quantitative development at Citadel Securities.

alumni.name: Amanda Taylor
alumni.bio: Combined quantitative skills with traditional finance, now working in Goldman's Quantitative Investment Strategies group.
